snippet: BEGUN--Martin S. Donald J. Trump and The Trump Organization are deeply saddened by the passing of Martin Begun, husband of the wonderful Louise Sunshine. Martin was a dear friend and great humanitarian. He had a long and extremely distinguished career, and was admired and respected by all who knew him. Our sincere condolences to Louise and family on this very somber occasion. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. Donald J. Trump and The Trump Organization are deeply saddened by the passing of Martin Begun, husband of the wonderful Louise Sunshine. Martin was a dear friend and great humanitarian. He had a long and extremely distinguished career, and was admired and respected by all who knew him. Our sincere condolences to Louise and family on this very somber occasion. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
